result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael J Prue

records.addlTxt: No contact with 400 Block. No contact with victim(s): J.S.F. and A.T.J., Modern Gents, Ciao, ANY Kwik Trip. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.  Take all prescribed medication as prescribed.  Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (3) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Clerk:  Amy. 
Called:  2:03 p.m. 
State appears by ADA Natalie Zibolski.  Defendant appears in custody, via Zoom Video, and with Atty Paige Metzman.   

Date and time set for initial appearance; VRCW.  
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 

BOND:  $2500.00 signature bond.  

CONDITIONS: 
- No contact with 400 Block. 
- No contact with victims; J.S.F. and A.T.J., Modern Gents, Ciao and ANY Kwik Trip. 
- Take all prescribed medications as prescribed.  
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 3 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.
